greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer partitions of n whose parts all have the same number of prime factors (counted with or without multiplicity) and whose product of parts is a squarefree number.
comment: Such a partition must be strict (unless it is all 1's) and its parts must also be squarefree.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Dec 14 2018
